homemadePotatoCanon.name: Homemade Potato Cannon

modularPotatoGun.name: Modular Potato Gun
modularPotatoGun.description: A potato gun able to be configured in many different ways, very versatile.

MPC15PotatoCanon.description: A potato cannon capable of launching spuds long distances.

potatoBazooka.name: Potato Bazooka
potatoBazooka.description: A potato gun not to be reckoned with.

sawedOffSpudGun.name: Sawed Off Spud Gun
sawedOffSpudGun.description: A potato gun with a short range, but a serious kick.

russetPotato.name: Russet Potato
russetPotato.description: Just a normal potato, great for french fries.

bakedPotato.name: Baked Potato
bakedPotato.description: A baked potato with a pad of butter on top.

loadedBakedPotato.name: Loaded Baked Potato
loadedBakedPotato.description: A baked potato with bacon, cheese, and sour cream, it looks delicious.
